name: Yifei Chen
reviewcontent: Using Book-keeper helped me keep track of my reading habit , it provides you the best book in the world also gives you reviews about books you added

name: Kaori Yamaguchi
reviewcontent: Book-keeper is the best application for new and veteran readers who want to get the latest book in their hands, I recommend it all my friends who really want to grow

name: Anthony Lewis
reviewcontent: Book reader helped me increase my concentration skills and really helped me get my hands dirty reading amazing books from great authors, I highly recommend for everyone

name: Enzokuhle Dennis
reviewcontent: Book reader helped me increase my become a good reader , I have read the latest books reviewed by world leaders , I highly recommend this application to everyone looking to improve more.

name: Omoh Adeyinka
reviewcontent: Book reader is the application for curious minded individuals who really wants to keep up with the best information from the best writers in the planet , if you want to be a good reader try book reader.
